app.name: WUPDownload
app.long_description:
This app is made for downloading installable content from the NUS directly onto the WiiU SD Card. If a ticket isn't found on the NUS, you can create fake ones (title.tik) at the start of a download. Please, don't do piracy with this app (Only download games that you have bought).
Source code can be found here: https://github.com/Pokes303/WUPDownloader
